DOC.brief_summary: This study aim evaluate extent weight loss 5-10 % baseline , induced exercise diet , improve metabolic inflammatory profile , endothelial function , erectile function , sexual desire , low urinary tract symptom ( LUTS ) , quality life obese men .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Lifestyle-modification Induced Weight Loss Sexual Urinary Function , Quality Life Obese Men
DOC.detailed_description: This study aim evaluate extent weight loss 5-10 % baseline , induced exercise diet , improve metabolic inflammatory profile , endothelial function , erectile function , sexual desire , low urinary tract symptom ( LUTS ) , quality life obese men.Men age 30-65 year , body mass index ( BMI ) â‰¥ 27.5 kg/m2 , recruit referral Sports Medicine Centre Changi General Hospital . The study conduct Sports Medicine Centre train medical investigator , dietician sport trainers.At baseline , 12 24 week , fast glucose lipid , insulin , testosterone , sex-hormone binding globulin , serum C-reactive protein interleukin-6 measure , endothelial function measure non-invasive EndoPAT method , validate questionnaire administer assess change erectile function , sexual desire , LUTS quality life
DOC.criteria: Male , age 3065 year Body Mass Index ( BMI ) > /= 27.5 kg/m2 Waist circumference ( WC ) > /= 90 cm pituitary disease cranial radiotherapy previous current androgen replacement deprivation therapy current treatment sexual problem LUTS glomerular filtration rate < 60 ml/min liver disease alcohol intake exceed 500 g/week previous 12 month use opiate , glucocorticoid , recreational drug phosphodiesterase inhibitor
